summary:
## The Twilight Saga

The "Twilight Saga" is a popular movie series based on Stephenie Meyer's books. It's about a human girl, Bella, who falls in love with a vampire, Edward. The series has five movies: "Twilight" (2008), "New Moon" (2009), "Eclipse" (2010), and "Breaking Dawn" split into two parts (2011 and 2012).

The movies made a lot of money but got mixed reviews from critics.  Even though some people didn't love them, they were huge hits with fans.
title: The Twilight Saga (film series)
